node.text:
Explorer/Activist Johan Ernst Nilson. Nilson has climbed the Seven Summits (and many other peaks), visited 178 countries and some of the most remote places on Earth, and he is in the Guinness Book of World Records for his Three Poles Challenge Expedition. His travels and experiences have allowed him to see climate change and its consequences first hand, and now Nilson is an activist for change, leading people on expeditions, giving talks, and making films about the environment.

node.text:
The Astronomia Everest project started with renowned Swedish explorer and environmental activist @johanernst taking an Astronomia Tourbillon with him on an expedition to the Himalayas.
"I wore the regular Astronomia Tourbillon on my last climb to the Himalayas, where I went up to 6,200 meters (almost 20,000 feet), in -30 C degree, extreme conditions," Nilson says. "You would think that such a complicated watch would be delicate and fragile, but it isn't, and it performed perfectly in all conditions. I used it climbing up ice walls, with my ice ax, banging it against rock and ice and it held up extremely well.”

Explorer/Activist Johan Ernst Nilson. Nilson has climbed the Seven Summits (and many other peaks), visited 178 countries and some of the most remote places on Earth, and he is in the Guinness Book of World Records for his Three Poles Challenge Expedition. His travels and experiences have allowed him to see climate change and its consequences first hand, and now Nilson is an activist for change, leading people on expeditions, giving talks, and making films about the environment.

node.text:
Push the right-hand crown of the incredible BUGATTI Chiron Tourbillon and the engine comes to life – the crankshaft turns and the 16 pistons pump up and down, just like BUGATTI’S iconic W16 engine. Two “turbochargers” on the side of the engine block spin while the engine runs, adding to the visual impact.
Incredible to see and unbelievably complicated to realize (the movement is comprised of 578 components), the BUGATTI Chiron Tourbillon timepiece seamlessly marries engines and watches – something no other watchmaker has done before.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀

node.text:
An Offer You Can’t Refuse. Look to the grand piano and see the notorious Vito Corleone as the newest addition to the Opera Godfather Minute Repeater. The Swiss Music Box combined with a triple-axis tourbillon, a minute repeater, and the Godfather himself might just be the offer you can’t refuse.⠀
⠀
Jacob & Co. has the exclusive rights, in partnership with Paramount Pictures, to use The Godfather logo, and the haunting melody in the amazing Opera Godfather Minute Repeater timepiece.
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
#jacobandco #jacobandcowatches #hautehorlogerie #hautehorology #inspiredbytheimpossible #godfather

node.text:
An Incredible Icon. Now with the face of Marlon Brando, the Opera Godfather Minute Repeater uses two hammers to strike exposed circular gongs to sound out the hours, the quarters of hours, and the minutes. In the Opera Godfather Minute Repeater, the gongs circle above the dial, visible through the large sapphire crystal and rose gold case. This voluminous case enhances the clarity, tone, and richness of the sound of the gongs.
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
#jacobandco #jacobandcowatches #hautehorlogerie #hautehorology #inspiredbytheimpossible #godfather

node.text:
The Astronomia Everest project started with renowned Swedish explorer and environmental activist @johanernst taking an Astronomia Tourbillon with him on an expedition to the Himalayas.
"I wore the regular Astronomia Tourbillon on my last climb to the Himalayas, where I went up to 6,200 meters (almost 20,000 feet), in -30 C degree, extreme conditions," Nilson says. "You would think that such a complicated watch would be delicate and fragile, but it isn't, and it performed perfectly in all conditions. I used it climbing up ice walls, with my ice ax, banging it against rock and ice and it held up extremely well.”

Explorer/Activist Johan Ernst Nilson. Nilson has climbed the Seven Summits (and many other peaks), visited 178 countries and some of the most remote places on Earth, and he is in the Guinness Book of World Records for his Three Poles Challenge Expedition. His travels and experiences have allowed him to see climate change and its consequences first hand, and now Nilson is an activist for change, leading people on expeditions, giving talks, and making films about the environment.

An Offer You Can’t Refuse. Look to the grand piano and see the notorious Vito Corleone as the newest addition to the Opera Godfather Minute Repeater. The Swiss Music Box  combined with a triple-axis tourbillon, a minute repeater, and the Godfather himself might just be the offer you can’t refuse.⠀
⠀
Jacob & Co. has the exclusive rights, in partnership with Paramount Pictures, to use The Godfather logo, and the haunting melody in the amazing Opera Godfather Minute Repeater timepiece.

node.text:
An Incredible Icon. Now with the face of Marlon Brando, the Opera Godfather Minute Repeater uses two hammers to strike exposed circular gongs to sound out the hours, the quarters of hours, and the minutes. In the Opera Godfather Minute Repeater, the gongs circle above the dial, visible through the large sapphire crystal and rose gold case. This voluminous case enhances the clarity, tone, and richness of the sound of the gongs.

node.text:
In the world of watchmaking, the presence of a tourbillon in a watch’s movement places the piece among the elite. @JacobandCo’s Twin Turbo Furious 300+ sets itself apart from this rarified group, incorporating two accelerated triple axis tourbillons into its striking design. The tourbillons work to compensate for the effects of gravity on the precision of the movement.⠀ ⠀
⠀
Even the case of the Twin Turbo Furious Bugatti 300+ is super complicated – made of forged carbon, with a titanium core to ensure water resistance - the case alone is comprised of 88 parts. The grand complication movement is made up of 832 individual parts – incredible to consider that many parts coming together, and amazing to see in action.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀

node.text:
The Phoenix, according to the Ancient Greeks, is a creature that is born again, rising from the ashes of the conflagration of its former self. A powerful symbol, the Phoenix is the focus of the latest Astronomia Art piece from Jacob & Co. Born from this maelstrom, the Phoenix in the Astronomia Art Phoenix is spreading its wings and protecting the double-axis tourbillon movement.

.⠀
.⠀

The Opera Godfather Minute Repeater adds yet another Grand Complication to the Jacob & Co. collection. Combining the Swiss Music Box with a triple-axis tourbillon and a minute repeater could just be an offer you can’t refuse.⠀
⠀
Jacob & Co. has the exclusive rights, in partnership with Paramount Pictures, to use The Godfather logo, and the haunting melody in the amazing Opera Godfather Minute Repeater timepiece.

node.text:
Defined by its sparkling design, contemporary style and high-end watchmaking solutions, the Epic X Chrono Full Baguette Green Dial is a sophisticated chronograph featuring 289 baguette diamonds that cover the bezel, dial ring, subdials, lugs, crown, and pushers. An additional 12 baguette dégradé rubies run along the inner bezel ring from 12 o’clock to 3 o’clock. A green mineral crystal dial provides a partial view of the caliber JCAA05 Skeleton column wheel chronograph movement. This combination of gem-set sparkle and high mechanics is housed in a 47mm, 18K rose gold case.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀

node.text:
With more than 21 carats of gems, the Epic X Chrono Full Baguette Green Dial is a sports watch with a bold, elegant sparkle. The 18k rose gold case is invisibly set with 41 baguette diamonds. The chronograph pushers are set with 12 baguette diamonds and the crowns set with 40 baguette diamonds and two round diamonds. 

The lugs contain 76 baguette diamonds. The bezel inner ring has 36 baguette diamonds. For a hint of color, the inner bezel ring from 12 to 3 o’clock is lined with baguette rubies in a gradated pattern. Even with all these gems, the watch is water resistant to 200 meters.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀

.⠀
.⠀

node.text:
The JCAA05 caliber for the sparkling Epic X Chrono Full Baguette Green Dial is a Swiss made automatic column-wheel chronograph movement controlled by two diamond-paved pushers (start/stop and reset). Green mineral crystal dial and caseback provides a partial view of the skeletonized movement in action. The chronograph uses a bi-compax layout with a small seconds subdial at 9 o’clock and a chronograph minute subdial at 3 o’clock. The central hand counts the chronograph seconds.

.⠀

node.text:
🔊 SOUND ON 🔊
⚡️Swipe left for the 2nd half of the video⚡️

The Jacob & Co. Astronomia Solar Jewelry Planets Zodiac provides a planetary-themed display with the iconic vertical Astronomia platform. This version of the versatile movement has three arms, each holding a complication exclusive to the Astronomia. A flying tourbillon and a rose gold and blue lacquered globe each make a rotation every 60 seconds, and an hours and minutes subdial. This along with four gems featuring the exclusive 288-facet Jacob-Cut rotate clockwise around the center of the watch every 10 minutes. 

Meanwhile a starry Aventurine base with half-sphere precious stones as planets make a counterclockwise spin every 10 minutes.

.⠀

node.text:
The Jacob & Co. Astronomia Solar Jewelry Planets Zodiac provides a sparkling interpretation of the solar system. The watch dial contains a planetary scene on a starry Aventurine base that rotates counterclockwise every 10 minutes. 

Seven planets are made of cabochon, half-sphere precious stones: white granite for Mercury, rhodonite for Venus, red jasper for Mars, pietersite for Jupiter, tiger eye for Saturn, blue calcite for Uranus and Lapis lazuli for Neptune. Meanwhile, the iconic Astronomia vertical movement with four gems and three moving complications makes a clockwise rotation every 10 minutes, creating a constantly moving scene of the cosmos.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀

node.text:
The Jacob & Co. Astronomia Solar Jewelry Planets Zodiac boasts three perfectly spherical colored gems that are on the groundbreaking vertical Astronomia movement. Each gem is finished with the patented 288-facet Jacob-Cut. 

The three arms of the movement contain a spinning rose gold and blue lacquered globe of the earth, a 60-second flying tourbillon and an hours and minutes subdial. This entire scene makes a full rotation in the watch case every 10 minutes. On the very top is a 1.5-carat citrine.

node.text:
💎 New Launch 💎 

The Brilliant Mystery Baguette White Diamonds Rose Gold watch combines brilliance and magic. The minute and hour hands appear to float within a column of sapphire crystal in a contemporary version of the mystery dial conceived approximately 200 years ago. 

This dial floats between brilliant baguette diamonds that cover the case and dial. Jacob & Co. uses baguette diamonds because it provides more brilliance when placed in an invisible setting. Diamond brilliance is the white light emitted from a diamond, which is the foundation of its beauty.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀

node.text:
💎 Introducing 💎 

The Brilliant Mystery Baguette White Diamonds Rose Gold combines exceptional gem-setting skills with a dial that mystifies and delights. The 18K rose gold case and dial are paved with 371 invisibly set baguette diamonds, totaling 29.13 carats. Between the gems, encased in sapphire crystal, black triangles that serve as hour and minute hands appear to mysteriously float within the dial. 

The diamonds are handset by a skilled gem setter into small grooves applied to the 18K rose gold case. Doing it this way provides a smooth uniform look to the gems.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀

node.text:
💎 New Timepiece 💎 

The Brilliant Mystery Baguette White Diamonds Rose Gold watch revolutionizes the approximate 200-year-old tradition of mystery dials, a concept first invented by a watchmaker who was also a magician and illusionist. 

In this contemporary version of the traditional watch, the minute and hour hands designed as black triangles appear to float in air inside a sapphire crystal cover between a case and dial paved with baguette diamonds. The Swiss quartz movement that powers the timepiece is invisible beneath the brilliance of the gems.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
#jacobandco #jacobandcowatches #hautehorlogerie #luxurylifestyle #luxurywatches #hautehorology #inspiredbytheimpossible #watchalert #watchoftheday #dailywatch

🔊 SOUND ON 🔊 
⚡️Swipe left for the 2nd half of the video⚡️

The Jacob & Co. Epic SF 24 Tourbillon Titanium travel watch blends nostalgia and innovation. The patented world time zone complication uses a traditional split-flap display once used at airports and train stations to determine the schedule updates for plane or trains. 

The fully mechanical complication with its 163 components has never been used in a watch before or since. It took two years to devise this unique mechanical complication and have it work seamlessly with the rest of the watch mechanics. This complication, and the rest of the watch’s functions, are powered by the JCAA03 automatic movement.

.⠀
.⠀

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by JACOB & CO. in Jacob & Co. with @jacobandco. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
The 45mm black DLC titanium case for the Jacob & Co. Epic SF 24 Tourbillon travel watch houses an anthracite opaline dial with an engraved center and 18K rose gold details. Applied baton indexes are coated with white SuperLuminova as is the rose gold skeleton hands. 

A one-minute flying tourbillon is at 10 o’clock. The patented split-flap world time zone display is set in a tube-shaped fixture above 12 o’clock. It operates on demand with a press of button flipping through cities in 24 time zones. This unique complication replicates the split-flap displays once common at airports and train stations.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
#jacobandco #jacobandcowatches #hautehorlogerie #luxurylifestyle #luxurywatches #hautehorology #inspiredbytheimpossible

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by JACOB & CO. in Jacob & Co. with @jacobandco. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
The Jacob & Co. Epic SF 24 Tourbillon travel watch is powered by the JCAA03 caliber. It comprises 473 components, including 163 parts for the groundbreaking 24-hour split-flap display. Time on the main dial is set by a crown at 4 o'clock. Once set, the world time display is adjusted by a dedicated pusher. 

The main dial and the second time zone display work together through a mechanical connection. As the main dial advances to the next hour, so does the split-flap hour display. This complication took two years to develop and adapt with the rest of the mechanics.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
